description: This course balances the elements of production with the elements of design, focusing on
materials, practices, and techniques used to create scenic and costume elements used in
live production. The course includes hands-on experience in the scenic and costume
studios, and projects in technical drawing, designing, analysis, and research.
Open to majors and non-majors. Also counts toward musical theater concentration. Prerequisite:
fullname: Scenery and Costume Design and Production
